00049 class cmod {
00050         protected:
00051                 cenvironment &env; 
00052                 std::ostream &out;
00053                 std::ostream &err;
00054                 cvq & vq;
00055                 const csess_basic & sessb;
00056                 const cgicc::Cgicc &cgi;
00057                 
00059                 cmod( cenvironment & e ) : env(e), out(e.out_get()), 
00060                         err(e.err_get()), vq(e.vq_get()), 
00061                         sessb(e.sessb_get()), cgi(e.cgi_get()) {} 
00062 
00063         public:
00065                 enum {
00066                         loopa, 
00067                         loopaf, 
00068                         notme, 
00069                         done,    
00070                         sessclose 
00071                 };
00072                
00074                 enum _modinfo {
00075                         mi_none = 0, 
00076                         mi_conf = 1, 
00077                         mi_menu = 2 
00078                 };
00079                 
00081                 unsigned modinfo;
00082 
00083                 virtual const char *id()=0; 
00084                 virtual const char *name()=0; 
00085                 virtual const char *menu()=0; 
00086                 virtual const char *conf()=0; 
00087                 virtual char run()=0; 
00088 };
